transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Haan mam network ki vajah se shayad call disconnect ho gayi thi.
Customer: Koi baat nahi hai sir main abhi baat karti hu office mein actually main office mein nahi hu main office se matlab main is time bol rahi hu main thoda bahar aayi hui hu. To main baat karti hu office mein is cheez ke liye ki calling walling ki call pickup nahi ho rahi hai jo bhi hai issue to main is cheez ko dekhti hu. Agar number change hota hai to aap please us wale ya to aap number agar vaise hi rehne dijiye aap second number pe main bol rahi hu aapko second number pe jyada call kijiye. Jo second diya hua hai na first ko ignore kar dijiye.
Executive: Theek hai abhi present time mein kis second pe connect kar lu?
Customer: Main ab main waha pe baat kar rahi hu aur main bolti hu sir ko sir bolenge ki wo second number pe staff pickup karega sir us call ko ignore tab bhi nahi karenge.
Executive: [inaudible] second pe call.
Customer: Haan haan.
Executive: Ab ye aapka concern tha isko mam close karne ke liye aapke paas jo present time pe bylead aa rahi hai na ab mujhe isme correction karna padega correction karne ke baad fir ye concern jo rahega usko bhi close karna rahega.
Customer: Hmm hmm. Aur sir ye ye jo jiske liye main dali thi complaint isse aapki baat hui thi kya aapki? Kisi ki matlab call wall pe jisne jisne ye insan ne dali hai ye baat hui thi kisi ki?
Executive: Mam isme ye hota hai na ki jaise agar hum hote yaha pe aapne ye Sunday ko dali thi.
Customer: Haan to Sunday ko jo hai na hum log ki chutti hoti hai. To ek India Mart ka nahi Saturday ko dali hai. Saturday ko Saturday ko dali thi. To Saturday Sunday hamara mam off hota hai. To jo aapka concern aata hai na wo directly jata hai yaha pe ek department baithta hai concern department. To fir wo connect karta hai.
Customer: Oh ho.
Executive: Haan ab jaise ye hai ab isko main yaha se raise karunga jaise aapne pura concern dala hai ab yaha se main isko raise karunga raise karne ke baad jo bhi jo byleads thi byleads ke sath mention karke ki yaha pe demand inki ye thi aur ye kaise post ho gayi. Mam mostly koshish aisa ye ho sakta hai ispe dusre ek sath do inquiry dali ho. Yaha pe do cheeze dali ho do inquiry ya to bylead to galti se post jo jo aapki baat hui hai wo us pe ho gayi hogi lekin mam clear to tabhi hoga jab waha pe usse baat hogi.
Customer: [inaudible]
Executive: Ye to mam prediction hai ki ha ye ho sakta hai.
Customer: Hmm hmm. Bahut si cheeze hospitals ke aisi cheeze aati hai matlab jo hamare relation matlab bilkul related nahi hai humse hamare item se ki bhai hospitals ki bahut sari cheeze aa gayi. Jaise laboratory wagera ki bhi aati hai main ye nahi keh rahi nahi aati hai. Lekin most of the time vahi aayengi.
Executive: Jaise mam present time pe bylead batau na jo aapke paas hai. Ye jaise pehli bylead jo present time pe aapke paas byleads hai main usko mam pata hai kya kariye jab jaise yaha pe aap upar jati hai na to waha pe aapko recommended ka option dikhta hai. To aap abhi present time pe na recommended pe India pe filter laga diya kariye. Kyunki abhi hamara jo hai na congestion pattern itna sahi hua nahi hai. Abhi hame hue aaye hue hamara congestion pattern itna sahi hua nahi ab recommended pe rehti hai to waha pe hame byleads pata hai jo hum consume kiye hai usse regarding agar waha pe bylead hai to theek hai nahi to idhar udhar ki bylead dikhne lagta hai wo. To behtar ye rehta hai ki hum India pe filter lagaye to India pe pata hai filter lagane ke baad hamare paas jitni bhi bylead hongi India Mart mein wo hame sari ki sari show karne lagegi. Jaise present time pe portable soil testing kit hai. Isse aap deal karti hai?
Customer: Soil kit?
Executive: Haan portable soil testing kit.
Customer: Haan haan karte hai.
Executive: Aur ye electromagnetic field meter.
Customer: Haan ye bhi bechte hai.
Executive: Haan EMF meter par par par ye pata hai kai baar kya hota hai ye log dalte kuch aur hai inko chahiye kuch aur hota hai. Kabhi kabhi aisa bhi hota hai ye in logo ka scene. Ye dal mam yaha pe yaha na yaha pe na.
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Executive: Yaha pe jab purana customer hai na buyer detail aap dekha kariye to uska congestion pattern kya hai wo kya kya cheeze aaj tak isne India Mart se purchase kari hai. To waha se mam idea lag jata hai ki iski jo demand hai wo actual mein vahi hai ki nahi. Ab jaise mam wo wo kidhar se pata lagta hai ye jara mujhe bata dijiye.
Executive: Mam jaise hi aap byleads pe jayengi na to agar mobile phone pe hai to aapko contact buyer now ke niche uska pura detail likha rehta hai ki kitna purana customer hai usne kya kya cheeze purchase kari hai.
Customer: Haan aur kisne requirement dali hai aaj tak.
Customer: Okay okay main dekh leti hu is cheez ko main dekhti hu. Actually main hu nahi na office mein to mujhe thoda sa ye hai ki main baithti hu leke laptop leke baithti hu dekhti hu is cheez ko.
Executive: To aap kab tak jayengi mam aapse hi connect kar leta hu na video call pe.
Customer: Mujhse connect karenge aap to kis pe mere mere wale number pe hi karenge kya?
Executive: Haan mam jo aapka number abhi ji.
Customer: To aap mere wale number pe kar lijiye lekin aap kab aap kab kab hai ye bataiye.
Executive: Kis kya cheez aap kab tak hai?
Customer: Timing kya hai usko connect karne ki call connect karne ki?
Executive: Mam aap bata dijiye kis time pe connect kar lu 9 to 6 rehta hai 9 to 6 mein aap jis time bolengi us time main connect kar dunga. Connect karne ke baad jo bhi correction honge agar bylead seedha udhar ki aa rahi hai to mam dekhiye koi na koi category waha pe add hogi. Koi category add hogi waha pe uski vajah se seedha udhar ki hamare paas bylead aa rahi hai wo category bhi hum dekh lenge kon si category ki vajah se category ki vajah se hamare paas wo bylead aa rahi hai waha pe jaake correction kar denge wo bylead aana band ho jayegi.
Customer: Theek hai to aisa karte hai sir ek ek dedh ghante baad connect karte hai theek hai sir thoda main bhi bahar hu to main thoda sa wo adjust kar lu cheeze.
Executive: To wo 1:30 baje tak kar lu?
Customer: Haan 1:30 baje tak kar lijiye aap 1:30 baje haan kyunki udhar do ke baad do se teen break ho jata hai to 1:30 baje kar lenge to waha pe correction sari cheeze kar lenge.
Customer: Theek hai theek hai.
Executive: Aadha ghante mein to ho hi jayega na.
Customer: Haan mushkil se saat se aath minute lagenge jyada se jyada lagenge. Sir ek baat aur mujhe puchni thi wo jo jo jo ladki meri kaam kar rahi thi na mere hamare India Mart ka wo ladki kya aapne fire kar di hai kya? Matlab aapke office mein working nahi hai wo?
Executive: Mam kya naam tha Parul Sinha naam tha kya kya naam tha?
Customer: Mahesh Mahesh.
Executive: Mahesh mam wo might bhi aisa ho sakta hai na ki wo sales department mein likho.
Customer: Okay. Haan unhone aapko sale kiya hoga na?
Customer: Nahi sales ki nahi thi wo to sara wo bana rahi thi na India Mart pe profile wagera hamari pictures wagera usme bhi sir cheeze reh gayi hai. Maine us ladki se contact kiya to usne support to kiya usne uska koi wo nahi hai lekin abhi recently jab maine usse last time baat kari to sir ho nahi payi meri uske sath main main product add karana chah rahi thi jo meri bahut pehle se baat chal rahi thi usse main kaha add kar dena to sir wo wo bhi product reh gaye mere to meri puri list tayar rakhi hui hai wo bhi add hi nahi hue sir. Main wo main samajh gaya mam aap pata hai wo catalog department hota hai jab wo services host hoti hai na to jo hamara catalog design hota hai wo unhi ko to wo product wagera aapke mangi hogi aapka catalog design karke di hogi aapko. Main main unko maine unko ye bola tha aap bas ye dal dijiye ki bhai aapka kaise kaise dalta hai naam wagera dal ke jaise catalog main upload kar dungi jaise PDF mein upload karte hai na itna to maine seekh liya tha usme upload ho jati hai wo sab cheeze. Ji ji ji. Hai na? To maine us itna bola tha ek list wise wo dal denge to main photo laga ke net se nikal ke matlab uska aur naam dal de PDF mein dal deti hu inke catalog. Sir wo nahi ho paye to wo hamare sabse matlab na most demanding items rehte hai hamare.
Executive: Koi dikkat nahi mam abhi aap aayengi na abhi aap aayengi video call pe 1:30 baje to main us time main upload kar dunga koi dikkat nahi.
Customer: Theek hai theek hai.
Executive: Main jo jo jo jo product ho aap mujhko bata dijiyega main yaha pe upload kar dunga aur main aapko guide bhi kar dunga kaise karte hai. Hmm hmm. To in future kabhi aapko ek aad product aise add karna hoga na to aap khud se bhi add kar sakti hai usko. Hmm. Add to sir aata hai mujhe wo photo adjustment ke liye jo uska pixel size hota hai jo bhi jaise ki wo cheez mujhe nahi aati hai sir. Main document upload kar sakti hu uska wo to maine kiya hua hai.
Executive: Koi nahi mam wo bhi cheez guide kar dunga.
Customer: Chaliye theek hai sir fir karte hai 1:30 baje karenge aap hai na?
Executive: Haan theek hai main aapko 1:30 baje connect karta hu isi number pe aur ye aapka jo concern tha mam isko main abhi close kar du?
Customer: Iska ye jo bylead wala tha? Haan bylead wala haan.
Executive: To wo to sir aap kar hi dijiye aap kya kehte hai lekin sir ab ab filter laga ke hum is cheez ko to khatam kar hi denge na ab to nahi aayengi na aise irrelevant mere paas.
Executive: Mam dekhiye 100% to khatam nahi ho sakti lekin jo irrelevancy hai wo cheeze waha pe hum khatam kar sakte hai mam agar hamare paas ek bar
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer received irrelevant buyleads.

- Unable to upload products to catalog.

- Inquires about a previous IndiaMART employee.



Resolution:

- Executive assured to resolve buylead issue.

- Executive offered assistance with catalog upload via video call.

- Clarified the previous employee might be in sales.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will connect on video call at 1:30 PM.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, catalog, subscription, filter, video call
